entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
